description: They've updated the fan-favorite Men’s Aconcagua line to include 100% recycled body fabric on the outside, and a combination of fully recycled 600-fill down and synthetic insulation on the inside. The Men’s Aconcagua 3 Jacket also features zoned sheet insulation in the shoulders and underarm for greater freedom of movement.
name: The North Face Aconcagua 3 Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 50% 600 fill recycled waterfowl down, 50% recycled polyester

specs.key: Top-chamber, underarm, side-panel and draft-flap insulation
